post.description:
Tips:
1. While not choose a port, device will pick up a random port to send SMS to every recipient.
2. While chose more than one ports, and just one SMS recipient , then device will use all chose port to
send SMS to this recipient.
3. If more ports, and more recipient designed, then every port will send SMS to every recipient
separately.

sr_cnt.description:
Max num of SMS
result can keep in
cache.

sr_prd.description:
The max time SMS
result can keep in
cache

sms_cnt.description:
Max num of SMS can
keep in cache

from.description:
Use‘,’‘-’to assign more than one port(from
channel 1)

smstype.description:
SMS type
0：SMS，
1：MMS，
2：MMS with multiple numbers and multiple subject

smstitle.description: MMS subject：MMS subject format is UTF-8，this parameter could be empty;

to_title_array.description: Multiple MMS recipients and subject arrays. This field is valid only when smstype=2

attachments.description:
MMS attachment，This field take effect only when smstype=1 or 2
a.There can be a most of 5 attachment,all attachment total length cannot exceed 100K,at present only support jpg、gif、txt、mp3 formatted file.
b.File type and file content use symbol | separate
c.Attachment is could be empty,send the content of the SMS filed as a TXT attachment

intvl.description: Interval of 2 SMS while device sending them(ms)

tmo.description: Max time while waiting sending result(second)

sdr.description:
If enable the successfully send report. 
1:enable,0:disable

sr_prd.description:
Status report period (seconds), 0: not on, >0: 
on

sr_cnt.description:
Single-state report SMS number, less than 1 will 
use the default value

status.description:
Task status code
0：OK
1：Invalid User
2：Invalid Port
3：USSD Expected
4：Pending USSD
5：SIM Unregistered
6：Timeout
7：Server Error
8：SMS expected
9：TO expected
10：Pending Transaction
11：TID Expected
12：FROM Expected
13：Duplicated TaskId
14：Unauthorized
15：Invalid CMD
16：Too Many Task
17：MMS Title expected
18：Too Many MMS Attachments
19：MMS Attachments expected
If task status ID not equal to 0, then means this task not received by device

message.recipients: One of parameters: to, contacts, groups is required.

post.description: When a SMS task is still waiting to be sent in the send queue, one or more SMS can be paused.
Resume the sending of one or more suspended SMS tasks.
Delete one or more SMS tasks waiting to be sent in the send queue.

get.description: Query the SMS task waiting to be sent in the send queue.

parameters.name: has_content
parameters.description:
Whether to bring a text message in the result
0 –Do not return text message content
1 –return text message content

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description:
The starting position of the request. 
0 represents the 
beginning of the first task

task_num.description: Query the number of tasks returned

from.description:
One or more (commas, short horizontal 
connections) send ports (from 1)

to.description:
One or more (comma connected) message 
receiver number.

coding.description:
Specifies the encoding of the message sent. 
0：Do not specify 
1：USC2 
2: 7bit

tasks.description: Query the returned array of tasks

post.description:
While SMS send successfully/failed/timeout, device will put the result in cache, after meet condition(cache storage full or cache time reached ),device will send POST request to report one or more task execute result. If it is group sending, device will report execute result periodically until all num in this group sending task get a result. 
Tips： 
1.tid related to the task ID in the send-sms message. 
2.sending, sent, failed are accumulated num in one task. 
3.Sdr(successfully send record) list records between 2 status-report, server should keep before details. 
4.fdr(failed detail record) list records between 2 status-report, server should keep before details.

sending.description: Total num of SMS in sending

sent.description: Total num of SMS successfully send

failed.description: Total num of SMS failed send

unsent.description: Total SMS in cache waiting for send

sdr.description:
Successfully send details(one list for 
one num)

time.description: SMS send timestamp in UTC time

carrier_reson.description: code+ description. Valid when [4] is failed to send

fdr.description: Fail send details(one num one list)

parameters.name: version
parameters.description:
API version  
1.0: Compatible with
previous API
1.1: Support for the description of this document

parameters.name: ports

status.description:
The current esim profile operation status, with
the following values The values are as follows: 0 - No operation
1 - Operation request submitted
2 - Profile operation is in progress on the
current port
3 - Operation error, the specific reason is described in the reason field

parameters.name: url
parameters.description:
Specific the report URL
Tips:
Special characters need do URL encode
Just need specific once time

parameters.name: period
parameters.description:
Report period
>0:Report status according to the specified report period,the minimum value is 60,the unit is second 
0:cancel status report

parameters.name: all_slots
parameters.description:
Get the status of all card slots
0：disable     1：enable

seq.description: Device status message sequence number, start from 1

port.description: Describe the current working port and SIM slot. Like 1.01,1.02.....32.04

seq.description: The port is incremented from port 1

st.description:
Port status code + detail 
0： No SIM card 
1： Exist idel SIM card 
2： Registering 
3： Registered 
4： call connected 
5： no balance or alarm 
6： Register failed 
7： SIM card locked by device 
8： SIM card locked by operator 
9： Recognize SIM card error
11：Card Detected
12：User locked
13：Port inter-calling
14：Inter-calling holding
15：Access Mobile Network
16：module Response timeout

opr.description: SIM card operator name and ID valid while parameter “st” equal to 3 or 4

inserted.description: A card is inserted into a slot.1:yes; 0:no

slot_active.description: Whether the card slot is enabled.1:enabled;0:disabled

led.description:
Led is enabled or not
1 is yes, 0 is no
